p: Nonetheless, there is no evidence about the cardiovascular effects of these pure compounds isolated concretely from MO. As the beneficial effects of the mentioned compounds highly depend on dose, frequency, administration route, and treatment duration, it remains a question whether application of themselves would exert the same effect when isolated from MO. It is the most probable that the MO-induced cardioprotection is mediated through various mechanisms of these compounds and its synergistic action.
